title: Vegetarian red lentil curry with spinach
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) red lentils', '4 tablespoons tomato pur√©e', '1/2 (200g) pot low fat natural yoghurt', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (2.5cm / 1 in) piece fresh root ginger, grated', '100g (4 oz) fresh spinach, coarsely chopped', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '4 sprigs fresh coriander, chopped', '1 (400g) tin mixed beans, rinsed and drained']
